result.title: Battle #3
result.content:
Hi. Iâ€™m glad to announce this contest. My friends (HamidReza_H & Ehsan.Poursaeed) and I (M_H_M) wrote problems. This is our first contest that we are together and I hope you enjoy this contest. Problems are similar to level 3 of Iran national olympiad in informatics. I want to thank Mike Mirzayanov (MikeMirzayanov) for great Codeforces and Polygon systems.

There are 4 problem and 2 hours to solve the problems.

Contest will start at 9:30 PM.

If there is some mistakes in English, Sorry for poor English :)

UDP : congratulation to the winner (Iman) I think It was not bad.
